mapper.insert: INSERT INTO shop_category ( id, name, parent_id, image_id, sort, store_id, create_time, update_time ) values ( #{id}, #{name}, #{parentId}, #{imageId}, #{sort}, #{storeId}, now(), now() )
mapper.select: SELECT c.*, f.file_path AS image_url FROM shop_category c LEFT JOIN shop_upload_file f ON c.image_id = f.file_id WHERE c.store_id = #{storeId} AND c.parent_id = #{parentId} ORDER BY c.sort ASC
SELECT * FROM shop_category WHERE store_id = #{storeId} ORDER BY sort ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE shop_category SET name = #{name}, parent_id = #{parentId}, image_id = #{imageId}, status = #{status}, sort = #{sort}, update_time = now() where id = #{id}
